golang study sample code 1

  1 package main
  2 
  3 import (
  4   "time"
  5   "fmt"
  6   "math/rand"
  7   "math"
  8 )
  9 
 10 type TimeEvent struct {
 11   From time.Time
 12   To time.Time
 13 }
 14 
 15 type TimeGap struct {
 16   From time.Time
 17   Duration int
 18 }
 19 
 20 func TestCreateSchedule(start time.Time, n int) []TimeEvent {
 21   var list []TimeEvent
 22   now := time.Now()
 23   rand.Seed(now.UTC().UnixNano())
 24   var f, t time.Time
 25   for i := 0; i < n; i++ {
 26     if i == 0 {
 27       f = start
 28     }
 29     t = f.Add(time.Duration(rand.Intn(120)+1) * time.Minute)
 30     list = append(list, TimeEvent{From: f, To: t})
 31     f = t.Add(time.Duration(rand.Intn(120)+1) * time.Minute)
 32     var _ = f
 33   }
 34 
 35   return list
 36 }
 37 
 38 func TimeAddRand(t time.Time, r int) time.Time {
 39   n := time.Unix(t.Unix(), 0)
 40   return n.Add(time.Duration(rand.Intn(r)+1) * time.Minute)
 41 }
 42 
 43 func FindRecommends(schedule []TimeEvent, minutes int, top int) []TimeEvent {
 44   rc := []TimeEvent{}
 45   now := time.Now()
 46   gaps := FindIntervals(schedule, now)
 47   //fmt.Printf("%v", gaps)
 48   for _, g := range gaps {
 49     sc := CreateScheduleByGap(g, minutes, top - len(rc), top)
 50     if len(sc) <= 0 {
 51       break
 52     }
 53 
 54     for _, s := range sc {
 55       rc = append(rc, s)
 56     }
 57   }
 58 
 59   return rc
 60 }
 61 
 62 func CreateScheduleByGap(timeGap TimeGap, minutes int, remain int, top int) []TimeEvent {
 63   list := []TimeEvent{}
 64   num := 0
 65   if timeGap.Duration == 0 {
 66     num = remain
 67   } else {
 68     num = int(math.Min(float64(remain), float64(timeGap.Duration / minutes)))
 69   }
 70 
 71   if num <= 0 {
 72     return list
 73   }
 74 
 75   from := timeGap.From
 76   for i:=0; i<num; i++ {
 77     to := from.Add(time.Duration(minutes) * time.Minute)
 78     list = append(list, TimeEvent{From: from, To: to})
 79     from = to
 80     var _ = from
 81   }
 82   return list
 83 }
 84 
 85 func FindIntervals(schedule []TimeEvent, now time.Time) []TimeGap {
 86   var gaps []TimeGap
 87 
 88   firstGap := int((schedule[0].From.Unix() - now.Unix()) / 60)
 89   if firstGap > 0 {
 90     gaps[0] = TimeGap{From: now, Duration: firstGap}
 91   }
 92 
 93   var from, to time.Time
 94   for i, s := range schedule {
 95     if i == 0 {
 96       from = s.To
 97       var _ = from
 98       continue
 99     }
100     to = s.From
101     minutes := int((to.Unix() - from.Unix()) / 60)
102     if minutes > 0 {
103       gaps = append(gaps, TimeGap{From: from, Duration: minutes})
104     }
105 
106     if i > 0 {
107       from = s.To
108       var _ = from
109     }
110 
111     if i >= len(schedule)-1 {
112       gaps = append(gaps, TimeGap{From: from, Duration: 0})
113     }
114   }
115 
116   return gaps
117 }
118 
119 func main(){
120   schedule := TestCreateSchedule(time.Now(), 1000)
121   //fmt.Printf("%v\n", schedule)
122   rc := FindRecommends(schedule, 45, 10)
123   fmt.Printf("%d, %v\n", len(rc), rc)
124 }
